name: madlib-hostmapping
description: A reusable host mapping construction for use in other madlib modules. Contains host mapping, environment hosts and cross domain configuration settings.

scripts.test: command -v grunt >/dev/null 2>&1 && grunt test || { echo >&2 'Grunt is not installed'; }
scripts.prepublish: command -v grunt >/dev/null 2>&1 && grunt || { echo >&2 'Grunt is not installed'; }
